# Annotated bibliography {#bibliography}


## Programming books

* Hadley Wickham, Garrett Grolemund. *"R for Data Science."* O'Reilly Media, 2017.  
*Outstanding all-around introduction to using the programming language R for data science. Contains several chapters on using ggplot2 for data visualization.*

* Kieran Healy. *"Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction."* Princeton University Press, 2018.  
*Excellent introduction to using ggplot2 for data visualization. Recommended as follow-up after Wickham and Grolemund's "R for Data Science".*

* Jake VanderPlas. *"Python Data Science Handbook: Essential Tools for Working with Data."* O'Reilly Media, 2016.  
*Excellent introduction to using the programming language Python for data science. Has extensive material on data visualization using Python's Matplotlib and Seaborn.*
